content: Defeating the pair is no easy attacks when you consider their hit-and-run tactics, so you may need to even the odds with A Pluck of Many Spell, or use a combination of Cloud Step and Immobilize to isolate and focus fire one of the Falcons, and then take out the second.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Longevity Road'.
The content is as follows:
Defeating the pair is no easy attacks when you consider their hit-and-run tactics, so you may need to even the odds with A Pluck of Many Spell, or use a combination of Cloud Step and Immobilize to isolate and focus fire one of the Falcons, and then take out the second.
